# VEHICLE::SET_VEHICLE_TYRES_CAN_BURST

## Summary
Sets if a vehicles tyre can burst

## Parameters
* **VEHICLE_INDEX** vehicle
* **BOOL** canBurstTyresFlag

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Allows you to toggle bulletproof tires.
